SELECT authority.url, authority.`name`, authority.id, authority.type, lastAuthority.`name` AS lastAuthority FROM authority AS authority LEFT JOIN t_perms AS lastAuthority ON authority.parent_id = lastAuthority.id WHERE (1 = 1)
AND authority.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{permsName},'%')

SELECT authority.url, authority.`name`, authority.id FROM authority AS authority WHERE (1=1)
AND authority.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT authority.`name`, authority.id FROM authority AS authority WHERE authority.type = #{type}
SELECT authority.id, authority.`name`, authority.parent_id FROM authority as authority WHERE authority.parent_id = '0'
SELECT authority.id, authority.`name` FROM t_perms authority WHERE authority.parent_id = #{fatherId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authority as authority WHERE authority.url = #{requestUrl}
